name: Serhii Smilianets
summary: With over six years of specialized experience in Salesforce Commerce Cloud (SFCC), I excel in delivering robust e-commerce solutions as a Full Stack Developer. My journey from front-end development to mastering complex back-end integrations highlights my versatility across technologies such as JavaScript, Node.js, and React. I have contributed to high-profile projects, enhancing functionalities like checkout processes, third-party integrations, and performance optimization, ensuring scalable and efficient systems. Certified in SFCC, I thrive in dynamic environments, always aiming to push the boundaries of e-commerce innovation.
